HomePage.title2: , a minimalist web app with a single goal: To ease meeting planning.
HomePage.subtitle1: Stop worrying about each attendee's availability! Just let each invitee enter their availabilities and the app will show the fitting time for everyone.
HomePage.paragraph1: This is a free-to-use webapp. You can <donate>contribute</donate> to its maintenance and improvement üéâ.
HomePage.paragraph2: You can <login>login</login> to have multiple events and track the results, or you can create an anonymous event.
HomePage.title3: When do I not need Reuplan?
HomePage.paragraph3: If you need a calendar to add your personal events: Google Calendar or similar. If you want to invite people to an event with a pre-defined schedule: E-Mail, Whatsapp, Google Calendar.
HomePage.paragraph4: If your event doesn't have a schedule yet and you need to find it considering your invitees, then Reuplan is for you. Do you want to make a rehearsal and need your whole crew to attend? Here it is, you're welcome!
HomePage.seachAnonEventTooltip: Enter an anonymous event code to attend

EventPage.title: Event
EventPage.calendarExplanation: These are the intersections where all attendees can participate. Please note that these are not the times when all invitees are available; some may not have responded yet.
EventPage.invitationExplanation: Invite a user, they will be notified by email. This user can decline or accept the invitation. The user must be registered in Reuplan to receive an invitation. (Soon it will be possible to invite users who are not registered in Reuplan).
EventPage.privacy0Description: Your invitees can see your event, answer to it and see the calendar results
EventPage.privacy1Description: Your invitees can see your event, answer to it, see how many invitees the event has and see the calendar results
EventPage.privacy2Description: Your invitees can see your event, answer to it, see the details of the invitees and see the calendar results
EventPage.privacy3Description: Your invitees can see your event, answer to it, see every invitees' attendance or rejection and see the calendar results
EventPage.mapsDisclaimer: Map generated by Google Maps, it may be inaccurate depending on the location entered by the host.
EventPage.newResponseDescription: Enter the date and period on which you could attend the event
EventPage.editErrorToast: Error updating the event, please try again later
EventPage.rejectionToast: You have declined this event; to remove your rejection, press the accept button
EventPage.notInvitedToast: You are not invited to this event!
EventPage.rejectionError: Error declining the event, please try again later
EventPage.rejectionDeleted: Decline removed, you can now attend the event by entering a time
EventPage.errorDeletingRejection: Error deleting the rejection, please try again later
EventPage.errorInsertingSchedule: Error entering the schedule, please try again later
EventPage.callToActionResponseToast: To attend the event, enter a time on which you can attend
EventPage.calltoActionParticipateToast: You are the host, but not an invitee of the event
EventPage.alreadyInvitedToast: This user has already been invited
EventPage.invitationSuccessToast1: Invitation sent! The user has been invited
EventPage.invitationErrorToast: Error inviting the user, please try again later.
EventPage.noInviteesEffectToast: This event has no invitees, invite someone!
EventPage.uninviteErrorToast: Error removing the invitation, please try again later.
EventPage.impossibleTimesToast: The end time must be after the start time!
EventPage.responseSubmitErrorToast: Error submitting response, please try again later.
EventPage.responseDeletionErrorToast: Error deleting response, please try again later
EventPage.calendarToast: Click on a smaller unlabeled schedule to see its details
EventPage.sentInvitations: {count, plural,=0{No invitations sent.} =1{1 Invitee.} other{# people invited.}}

ContactPage.title: Contact
ContactPage.description:
Do you have questions? Want to report a bug? Want to suggest a feature? Want to say hello? Want to collaborate? Want to hire me? Or just spam me?

Please be kind and respectful. I may not be able to tolerate it otherwise.
ContactPage.name: Name
ContactPage.subject: Subject
ContactPage.errorToast: Error sending the contact form, please send an email to merengueconjamon@gmail.com instead.
ContactPage.formErrorEmail: I couldn't respond to you with an email like that!
ContactPage.formErrorMessage: Too short! A decent message can't have so little information üò°
ContactPage.checkMessage: Type send contact message to be able to send the message

CreateEventPage.title: New Event
CreateEventPage.mapsDescription: Show a Google Maps' search for for the location. Be as precise as possible to ensure the exact place is found.
CreateEventPage.formPrivacy0Description: Your current privacy setting is <primary>"Event only"</primary>. Your invitees can see your event, answer to it and see the calendar results
CreateEventPage.formPrivacy1Description: Your current privacy setting is <primary>"Number of invitations"</primary>. Your invitees can see your event, answer to it, see how many invitees the event has and see the calendar results
CreateEventPage.formPrivacy2Description: Your current privacy setting is <primary>"Invitee details"</primary>. Your invitees can see your event, answer to it, see the details of the invitees and see the calendar results
CreateEventPage.formPrivacy3Description: Your current privacy setting is <primary>"Attendance"</primary>. Your invitees can see your event, answer to it, see every invitees' attendance or rejection and see the calendar results
CreateEventPage.submitErrorToast: Error creating event, try again later...

AccountPage.title: Account
AccountPage.nicknameDescription: Name that will be displayed in most places
AccountPage.name: Name
AccountPage.nameDescription: Your actual name for people to identify you
AccountPage.showEmailDescription: Allow other users to see your email address (Hosts can always see your email)
AccountPage.updateErrorToast: Error updating user, please try again later

Navbar.pendingToast: You have {count,plural,=1{a pending invitation} other{# pending invitations}}

AnonEventPage.title: Event
AnonEventPage.dateChangeDescription: Select the range of dates on which the event can take place.
AnonEventPage.editErrorToast: Error updating the event, please try again later
AnonEventPage.currentParticipantSchedules: Submitted schedules by the current participant
AnonEventPage.newScheduleErrorToast: Error creating schedule, please try again later
AnonEventPage.noMatchingSchedules: Current schedules do not overlap for all participants
AnonEventPage.errorLoadingSchedules: Error loading schedules, please try again later.
AnonEventPage.errorLoadingPaticipants: Error loading participants, please try again later.
AnonEventPage.expiresTip: To extend the event, change it's date range.
AnonEventPage.codeTip: This is the code you can share with others to join the event. You can also just share the link
